Converts {{c|*this}} to an {{tt|auto_ptr}} for a different type {{tt|Y}}.

@1@ Returns an implementation-defined type that holds a reference to {{c|*this}}. {{lc|std::auto_ptr}} is [[cpp/memory/auto_ptr/auto_ptr|convertible]] and [[cpp/memory/auto_ptr/operator{{=}}|assignable]] from this template. The implementation is allowed to provide the template with a different name or implement equivalent functionality in other ways.

@2@ Constructs a new {{tt|auto_ptr}} with a pointer obtained by calling {{lc|release()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ An implementation-defined type that holds a reference to {{c|*this}}.

@2@ An {{tt|auto_ptr}} with a pointer obtained by calling {{lc|release()}}.
